text: Flores is one of the Lesser Sunda Islands, an island arc. Its area is about . It goes east from the island of Java. There are about 1.5 million people in Flores."Trapping Komodo Dragons for Conservation" National Geographic - 28 Jan 2003 The largest town is Maumere. Flores is east of Sumbawa and Komodo. It is west of Lembata and the Alor Archipelago. To the southeast is Timor. To the south is the Sumba strait. The Flores Sea is to the north. On December 12 1992, an earthquake measuring 7.0 on the Richter scale occurred. It killed 2,000 people in the town of Maumere. == References == Category:Islands of Indonesia Category:Lesser Sunda Islands Category:East Nusa Tenggara
title: Flores
